name: Lava Jump - Blocks
description:
How far can you go while avoiding the shifting platforms?

Once you start rolling you cannot stop.

The changing platform levels are dangerous. Avoid crashing into walls by jumping over them, but don’t forget to collect the gems along the way.

Lava Jump requires a precise and quick reaction. So, time your taps carefully because it’s very easy to break the pattern of your progress and lose the game.
